title: Bugis (1895) Joshua-Ruth
description: Bugis translation of the Books of Joshua and Ruth published in 1892 by the Bible Society of the Netherlands. Buginese or Bugis is a language spoken by about five million people mainly in the southern part of Sulawesi, Indonesia.

language.name: Buginese
language.area: Western coast of southeast Sulawesi in Kolaka, Wundulako, Rumbia, and Poleang districts. Also in major towns of Sulawesi. Large enclaves also in other provinces of Sulawesi, Kalimantan, Maluku, Papua, and Sumatra; coastal swamp areas such as Bulukumba, Luwu, Polewali in Polmas, Pasangkayu in Mamuju districts. Also in Malaysia (Sabah).
